generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, designed for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and poles.
- building: Large glass-fronted buildings are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalks.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black Toyota and a white Honda.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing green.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are mounted on poles at the intersection.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
